titleStmt.title: An humble reque[st to the honourable charitable gentry of] St. Pauls Covent-Garde[n], with other great and noble persons, ladies, gentry, and well-wishers to the numerous poor children in St. Martins, St. Giles's, and St. Clements Danes, in the [c]ounty of Middlesex

notesStmt.note: Title words in brackets from Wing.
Place of publication suggested by Wing; date of publication conjectured from text; Wing gives date: 1685.
Copy torn at head with loss of text; cropped; print fade.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
